name: ZombVasion
description:
The world has come to see death in the eyes. Swarms of zombies are destroying humanity and taking over the world. The only way out is to kill all of them. ZombVasion is a 2D-RPG zombie apocalypse game, where your goal is to clear the plagued houses from zombies and destroy the plague hearts while doing quests. Buy new weapons and level up, to become an even stronger survivor. 

Alert: The game is in early access, meaning that a lot of content is not in the game. This is a prototype, that should show the idea of the game.
